name: un/fixing demo
description:
un/fixing is a comedy turn-based role playing game in 1-bit monochrome.

The princess of Ashetol has been kidnapped by an evil lord of darkness! It's up to you, the hero, to rescue her!

...Right? That's usually how this sort of game works...

Meet a colorful cast of characters and take part in a hilarious and moving adventure about living in a world that's not made for you.

Support + Download Demo

Download the first chapter of un/fixing's story for free, right now!

Want to support the development of un/fixing?
